mapper.select: insert into menu( menu_id, menu_name, menu_path, menu_comment, is_delete, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version ) values( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPath}, #{menuComment}, #{isDelete}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, now(), 0 )
select menu_id , menu_name, menu_comment, version from menu where is_delete = 0 AND menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.update: update menu set menu_id = #{menuId}, menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_path = #{menuPath}, menu_comment = #{menuComment}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and version = #{version} and menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_comment, version from menu where is_delete = 0 order by create_time asc
